title: As an existing user, submit a purchase flow with valid information
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has a valid existing account
custom_steps:
WHEN The user loads the purchase flow
AND The user logs in
AND The user completes the purchase flow with valid information
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation page displays for the user
AND The user receives a confirmation email
AND The user confirms purchase details

title: As a new user, submit a purchase flow as a new user with valid information
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has a valid email account
custom_steps:
WHEN The user loads the purchase flow
AND The user registers
AND The user completes the purchase flow with valid information
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation page displays for the user
AND The user receives a confirmation email
AND The user confirms purchase details

title: As an existing user, submit a purchase flow with invalid information
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has a valid existing account
custom_steps:
WHEN The user loads the purchase flow
AND The user logs in
AND The user completes the purchase flow with invalid information
custom_expected: THEN The purchase flow should not submit successfully

title: As a new user, submit a purchase flow as a new user with invalid information
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has a valid email account
custom_steps:
WHEN The user loads the purchase flow
AND The user registers
AND The user completes the purchase flow with invalid information
custom_expected: THEN The purchase flow should not submit successfully

title: Verify the purchase flow can be submitted with different billing and shipping address
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is on the purchase page of the purchase flow
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the purchase page with billing and shipping addresses that are different
AND The user submits the purchase page
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation page displays for the user
AND The user receives a confirmation email
AND The user confirms purchase details

title: Verify the purchase flow can be submitted with the same billing and shipping address
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is on the purchase page of the purchase flow
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the purchase page with billing and shipping addresses that are the same
AND The user submits the purchase page
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation page displays for the user
AND The user receives a confirmation email
AND The user confirms purchase details

title: Verify the purchase flow can be submitted with a state that is taxed
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is on the purchase page of the purchase flow
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the purchase page with an address of a taxable state (For example, Illinois)
AND The user submits the purchase page
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation page displays for the user
AND The user receives a confirmation email
AND The user confirms purchase details

title: Verify the purchase flow can be submitted with a state that is not taxed
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is on the purchase page of the purchase flow
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the purchase page with an address of a state that is not taxed (For example, New York)
AND The user submits the purchase page
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation page displays for the user
AND The user receives a confirmation email
AND The user confirms purchase details

title: Verify the purchase flow can be submitted with international countries
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is on the purchase page of the purchase flow
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the purchase page with an international address (Not US or Canadian)
AND The user submits the purchase page
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation page displays for the user
AND The user receives a confirmation email
AND The user confirms purchase details

title: Verify the purchase flow can be submitted with Canadian address
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is on the purchase page of the purchase flow
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the purchase page with a Canadian address
AND The user submits the purchase page
custom_expected:
THEN The confirmation page displays for the user
AND The user receives a confirmation email
AND The user confirms purchase details

title: Verify the purchase can be cancelled
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user successfully completed a purchase flow
custom_steps: WHEN The user cancels the subscription
custom_expected:
THEN The sub-mgmt page should update
AND The subscription details should update in the admin tool

title: Verify the purchase can be refunded
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user successfully completed a purchase flow
custom_steps: WHEN The user refunds the purchase
custom_expected:
THEN The user should get a refund email
AND The subscription details should update in the admin tool
